Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; part of a lotus flower in added white outline with added red centre; below, two white bands; top of lip glazed; exterior reserved save for two lines near rim.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1000) (phase 2)
